column5: of kilbourne passed away at his home on thursday
column8: 1924 to victor and alice (clark) lane. on june 24
column9: 1958 in peoria he married shirley dennis who preceded him in death in 2002. howard is survived by 3 children: alice (james) dingman of tx
column10: larry lane of kilbourne and paula (chris) bartels of clinton
column11: 9 grandchildren and 6 great-grandchildren. he was preceded in death by his parents and daughter brenda cornell. he was a member of bethel baptist church and served in the united states army. howard retired from caterpillar in 1989. he enjoyed camping
column13: going to tonis and going to the lake. a funeral service will be held on wednesday
column15: 2015 at 11:00 am at hurley funeral home in havana with pastor duane turley officiating
column16: burial to follow at kilbourne cemetery. visitation will be held one hour prior from 10:00 am till 11:00 am at the funeral home. memorial contributions can be made to harbor light hospice. hurley funeral home in havana is in charge of the arrangements. upcoming events. visitationjun 24. 10:00 am - 11:00 am hurley funeral home - havana217 north plum street p. o. box #648. havana
